definition: Longmen Grottoes at Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳[Luo4 yang2], Henan
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Shi
cave/hole

sentences.english: The story of vanquishing demons in Ludong is the only one in Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 路洞石窟降魔變是龍門石窟唯一的一鋪。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are one of the three major treasure houses of stone carving in China.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟是中國三大石窟瑰寶之一。

sentences.english: Cliff inscriptions of sutra in Longmen Grottoes were, as many as 19, all finished during the early Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟的摩崖刻經達19部之多，全部爲初唐所刻。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottos are situated on the bank of the Yi River in Luoyang, Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 龍門石窟座落在河南省洛陽伊水兩岸。

sentences.english: Fengxian Temple is the biggest cave in Longmen Grottoes, which is 30-meter in length and width.
sentences.chinese: 奉先寺是龍門石窟中最大的一個窟，長寬各30餘米。

sentences.english: After lunch, I managed a brief visit to the Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午餐後，我走馬觀花地參觀了龍門石窟。

sentences.english: After the Sui and Tang Dynasties Longmen Grottoes only.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐以後的龍門石窟纔出現。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are cultural heritage in the world.
sentences.chinese: 河南省龍門石窟是世界文化遺產。

sentences.english: The magnificent Longmen Grottoes are ancient sculptures priceless to Buddhists.
sentences.chinese: 氣勢雄偉的龍門石窟，是佛門珍貴的古代雕刻藝術。

sentences.english: Longmen Grottoes is the peak of Western Hills.
sentences.chinese: 來到了龍門石窟，就算是西山的山頂了。

sentences.english: The 20th century saw a rapid development in the academic research on Longmen Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 20世紀是龍門石窟學術研究迅速發展的百年。

definition: the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China
Yungang Caves at Datong 大同, Shanxi 山西
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
Lintong District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Sixteen Kingdoms of Five non-Han people (ruling most of China 304-439)/also written 五胡十六國|五胡十六国
Kumbum (Chinese Ta'er), monastery in Qinhai, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Juyongguan, frontier fortress on Great Wall north of Beijing, in Changping district 昌平區|昌平区[Chang1 ping2 qu1]
founding master of a monastery/founder/originator
Linggu temple (Nanjing)
Weihui county in Xinxiang 新鄉|新乡[Xin1 xiang1], Henan
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
Jiayu Pass in Gansu, at the western terminus of the Great Wall/Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Xuankong Temple or Suspended Temple near Yanyuan in Shanxi
Jianzhen or Ganjin (688-763), Tang dynastic Buddhist monk, who crossed to Japan after several unsuccessful attempts, influential in Japanese Buddhism
